resources.string: For your first scavenger hunt item, check out the current weather on mars. For extra learning, search the internet for more information about weather patterns on mars and how solar dates differ from the date system that we use on earth.

Now that you have got an idea of the weather up on the red planet. Its time to learn about the research nasa is doing at the moment. Open up the image and video library and check out some videos about the mars rover!

Learn about one of the most tragic events in the history of the United States space program by finding some information about the challenger disaster. Who was affected? Why was the mission being undertaken? What changes were made to make spaceflight safer?

You probably noticed the cool space photo when you opened up the app. For a learning experience search the content of the photo. Was the photo of a planet? A star? Something else? Where is the object located?
Can you find a video from the original moon landing? Compare the technology and appearance of the space craft with footage of a more modern spacecraft landing

Have you ever seen one of the famous movies about the apollo missions? Find some footage from the apollo 11 landing? If you have seen the movies, how does the movie compare factually to the actual events?

What happens in the mission control room is one of the most important aspects of a successful space landing. Find some footage of what goes on in the room and learn more about the process of launching a rocket into space.
